description.p:
This class is derived (and can use functions) from:
wxScrolledWindow
wxPanel
wxWindow
wxEvtHandler

item.p: An object reference, The representation is internal and can be changed without notice. It can't be used for comparsion stored on disc or distributed for use on other nodes.

desc.p:
See external documentation.
Also:
new(Parent, Id, [Option]) -> wxGrid() when
Parent::wxWindow:wxWindow(), Id::integer(),
Option :: {'pos', {X::integer(), Y::integer()}}
| {'size', {W::integer(), H::integer()}}
| {'style', integer()}.

func.name: blockToDeviceRect(This, TopLeft, BottomRight) -> {X::integer(), Y::integer(), W::integer(), H::integer()}
cellToRect(This, Row, Col) -> {X::integer(), Y::integer(), W::integer(), H::integer()}

desc.p:
See external documentation.
Also:
isVisible(This, Coords, [Option]) -> boolean() when
This::wxGrid(), Coords::{R::integer(), C::integer()},
Option :: {'wholeCellVisible', boolean()}.

func.name: selectBlock(This, TopRow, LeftCol, BottomRow, RightCol) -> ok
func.fsummary: Equivalent to selectBlock(This, TopRow, LeftCol, BottomRow, RightCol, []).

desc.p: Equivalent to selectBlock(This, TopRow, LeftCol, BottomRow, RightCol, []).

func.name: selectBlock(This, TopRow, LeftCol, BottomRow, RightCol, Options::[Option]) -> ok
setCellAlignment(This, Row, Col, Horiz, Vert) -> ok

desc.p:
See external documentation.
Also:
setCellBackgroundColour(This, Colour, Row, Col) -> 'ok' when
This::wxGrid(), Colour::wx:wx_colour(), Row::integer(), Col::integer().

See external documentation.
Also:
setCellTextColour(This, Val, Row, Col) -> 'ok' when
This::wxGrid(), Val::wx:wx_colour(), Row::integer(), Col::integer().

See external documentation.
Also:
setCellValue(This, Val, Row, Col) -> 'ok' when
This::wxGrid(), Val::unicode:chardata(), Row::integer(), Col::integer().

func.name: destroy(This::wxGrid()) -> ok
func.fsummary: Destroys this object, do not use object again.

desc.p: Destroys this object, do not use object again
